titleStmt.title: The Kings Majesties declaration to all his loving subjects of his Kingdome of Scotland. With an act of the Lords of His Majesties Privie Counsell for the printing and publishing thereof.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
